dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S2246 IS: End the Partisan IRS Culture Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to exempt the Internal Revenue Service from certain labor-management relations requirements.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the End the Partisan IRS Culture Act or the EPIC Act.
Section 7103(a)(3) of title 5, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (G), by striking or at the end;
in subparagraph (H), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following:
